description:
As the battle between Utsuro and Umibozu comes to a head, Kamui reflects on his childhood, where he had to deal with an increasingly sick mother and an increasingly absent father.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de la bataille finale de Rakuyô 9 - Lapin perdu
Battle on Rakuyo Arc: Part 9 - The Lost Rabbit
Rakuyou Kessen Hen Kyuu: Mayoi Usagi
洛陽決戦篇九 まよい兎
